nodes.text: Per Düring Risager is a film director and editor who worked on LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles[source?] and LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. He directed the Freemaker Adventures episodes "Zander's Joyride" and "The Maker of Zoh". Risager has worked on other projects including Lego Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu, The Ugly Duckling and Me!, and Help! I'm a Fish.
